text: You're using the wrong list id
You need the ILS id (click the "Details" button near the "Actions" drop down in upper right)

<@U05Q2R4ESCA> we need like alarm bell klaxons in the docs *everywhere* about the list id mismatches, cause this is gonna keep happening. It needs to be like every 2nd sentence cause when we release list edit stuff things like this can cause really serious issues for customers
<@U01NSBVR4CE> two id fields is really misunderstanding. Looks like a mistake on HS side

Its definitely unfortunate; but not really something we can fix until we can turn off the old API which requires the new API to be available first. If I could go back in time to 2017 and make us use the same list ids in both list systems I would. C'est la vie
I will work with our technical writer to get the docs updated to be more clear in regards to which list IDs to use with this new API. Sorry for the inconvenience!
